body_html:
@jiayiliu Have you solve this problem? the chief worker is hang when i use tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer and tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession, but the other worker was finished and exit successfully. then the chief worker show as follow:
Exception in thread QueueRunnerThread-dummy_queue-sync_token_q_EnqueueMany:
CancelledError: Step was cancelled by an explicit call to Session::Close().
